description:
Half-Life Advanced Effects (HLAE) is a tool to enrich Source (mainly CS:GO) engine based movie making.


- Included AfxHookSource2 0.35.3 (2025-07-03T07:30Z).
AfxHookSource2 0.35.3 (2025-07-03T07:30Z)
- Adjusted to CS2 update, #1065 by @ChetdeJong
- Improved mirv_replace_name a bit. (Does not replace chat messages, use tv_nochat true)
